column4: how do you change the log in session to the standard sign in and not the "no serving hosts are found" screen?
try this: ask the whole channel the following :) "Did my question make sense?"
I guess not. I changed my session options by mistake and cannot get is back to the regular sign on instead of the remote host sign on.
try asking your latest revision of the question to the channel.  See if anyone replies.  If not, before you try repeating, ask the channel: "Did my question make sense?"  :)
